verbose_text: Consistently, knockdown of YAP1 in hCerECs upregulated many antiviral ISGs, such as MX1, CH25H, IFITMs (inhibitors of virus entry), and APOBEC3G, OAS1/2, ISG15, and IFI44L (suppressors of virus translation and replication).
evidence: YAP1 in hCerECs upregulated many antiviral ISGs, such as MX1, CH25H, IFITMs (inhibitors of virus entry), and APOBEC3G, OAS1/2, ISG15, and IFI44L
